[ARG0: One of President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer Michael Cohen 's business partners , known as " the Taxi King , "] agreed to [V: cooperate] [ARG1: with the government] [ARG2: as a potential witness] [ARGM-ADV: as part of a plea deal] , The New York Times reported Tuesday .

One of President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer Michael Cohen 's business partners , known as " the Taxi King , " agreed to cooperate with the government as a potential witness as part of a plea deal , [ARG0: The New York Times] [V: reported] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
